title: Telecom Subscription
description: Collects all generic details related to a customer's telecom subscription plan, including pricing, packages, and individual product subscriptions.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:responsiblePartyID.title: Responsible Party ID
xdm:responsiblePartyID.description: Identifier for the person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.

xdm:bundleName.title: Bundle Name
xdm:bundleName.description: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + Media'.

xdm:internetSubscription.description: Internet subscription plan details such as data cap, connection type, and speed details.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:dataCap.title: Data Cap
xdm:dataCap.description: Captures the data cap limit for the account, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:connectionType.title: Connection Type
xdm:connectionType.description: Tracks the type of connection type for the subscription.

xdm:downloadSpeed.title: Download Speed
xdm:downloadSpeed.description: Records the maximum download speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:uploadSpeed.title: Upload Speed
xdm:uploadSpeed.description: Records the maximum upload speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:selfSetup.title: Self-Setup
xdm:selfSetup.description: Flags if a customer is eligible for internet setup without a technican visit.

xdm:landlineSubscription.description: Landline subscription plan details including selected features, minutes, and dialing plans.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
xdm:phoneNumber.description: Captures the phone number assigned to this device.

xdm:minutes.title: Minutes
xdm:minutes.description: Number of monthly minutes available within the subscription.

xdm:voicemail.title: Voicemail
xdm:voicemail.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Voicemail.

xdm:callForwarding.title: Call Forwarding
xdm:callForwarding.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Forwarding.

xdm:callerID.title: Caller ID
xdm:callerID.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Caller ID.

xdm:callBlocking.title: Call Blocking
xdm:callBlocking.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Blocking.

xdm:callWaiting.title: Call Waiting
xdm:callWaiting.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Waiting.

xdm:threeWayCalling.title: Three-Way Dialing
xdm:threeWayCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Three-Way Dialing.

xdm:internationalCalling.title: International Calling
xdm:internationalCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include International Calling.

xdm:unlimitedLocalCalling.title: Unlimited Local Calling
xdm:unlimitedLocalCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Local Calling.

xdm:unlimitedDomesticLongDistance.title: Unlimited Domestic Long Distance
xdm:unlimitedDomesticLongDistance.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Domestic Long Distance.

xdm:mediaSubscription.description: media subscription plan details including number of channels & included streaming services.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:channels.title: Channels
xdm:channels.description: Records the number of channels included with the media subscription.

xdm:streamingServices.title: Streaming Services
xdm:streamingServices.description: Array of all streaming services included with the subscription.

xdm:serviceName.title: Service Name
xdm:serviceName.description: Records the name of the streaming service.

xdm:promotionalAddition.title: Promotional Addition
xdm:promotionalAddition.description: Flags if the streaming service was added as part of a promotion.

xdm:promotionLength.title: Promotion Length
xdm:promotionLength.description: Tracks the length of the promotion, in months, if the streaming service was added as part of a promotion.

xdm:mobileSubscription.description: Mobile plan details including number of lines, data rates, cost, etc.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:earlyUpgradeEnrollment.title: Early Upgrade Enrollment
xdm:earlyUpgradeEnrollment.description: Captures if the customer opts into early upgrades.

xdm:planLevel.title: Plan Level
xdm:planLevel.description: Captures the name of the mobile plan assigned to this device.

xdm:phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
xdm:phoneNumber.description: Captures the phone number assigned to this device.

xdm:portedNumber.title: Ported Number
xdm:portedNumber.description: Captures if the customer ports their number from another carrier.
